no committee hearings, no regular order of vote was held with implications concerning a
pretty essential constitutional right. And immediately after Senator Schuler, the majority leader,
used the procedure is called filling the tree and filing cloture, which means he's going to block

on on stone tablets and you can't change it from here on out. And this is how they set it up

what the bill is. Then they put it in front of you guys say, you know, you have no time to read it,
you just have to vote. Trust us. I mean, I don't know the last time I heard a real debate on a bill.
I mean, you used to when they were important things, we would watch C-SPAN believe it or not.

happened in the last 10 years. Do we have a Senate? Well, yeah, we do. We do. And there are plenty
